_comment: Multinational GDPR DSAR with financial services, multiple jurisdictions, and regulated entity correctly scores 0.689 (HIGH risk, threshold >= 0.65). Decision remains REVIEW_REQUIRED per DATA_PRIVACY override logic.
title: Multinational GDPR Data Subject Access Request
description: Large multinational company handling GDPR Data Subject Access Request

task.description: Process a GDPR Data Subject Access Request (DSAR) from an EU resident requesting access to their personal data
